item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description:
Hi Asma,
Thanks! It's just Sainsbury's own brand, regular food colouring rather than a paste or gel. Good look with your next go!x
item.content:encoded:
Hi Asma,

Thanks! It’s just Sainsbury’s own brand, regular food colouring rather than a paste or gel. Good look with your next go!x

item.title: By: Asma
item.dc:creator: Asma
item.description:
Hi Katie,
These look amazing! As does the rest of the blog.
Just wanted to know which brand of food colouring you used? Every time I've made red velvet its a perfect red before it goes in the oven but seems to have a tinge of orange/brown once its out. Not so spectacular as cute little red ones!
Thanks,
As
item.content:encoded:
Hi Katie,

These look amazing! As does the rest of the blog.

Just wanted to know which brand of food colouring you used? Every time I’ve made red velvet its a perfect red before it goes in the oven but seems to have a tinge of orange/brown once its out. Not so spectacular as cute little red ones!

Thanks,

As
